extDescription.message: This extension releases the memory of inactive tabs after a specified time.

keybind.description: the string of buttons in the options page

history.description: the string of buttons in the options page

change_history.description: the string of buttons in the options page

information.description: the string of buttons in the options page

setReleaseFileUrlTitle.message: Specifies the page to be used for memory release.

setTimerTitle.message: The duration to unload inactive tabs

restore.message: Tabs before the crash are restored

switch_not_release.message: Switch to temporarily exclude purge or restore
switch_not_release.description: the menu in the options page

no_release.description: an option menu name in author

explanation.message: Please keep in mind the following when using this extension:
explanation.description: Description of the used Release Page

explanation_problem1.message: If this extension become invalid, the purged tabs will close.
explanation_problem1.description: Explanation of the problem about 'the inside of expanded function'

explanation_solution.message: Use the popup menu 'Tabs before the crash are restored' to restore the closed tabs.
explanation_solution.description: Solution to when occured about the problem in this extension

explanation_problem2.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

explanation_problem3.message: If the server is down, this might not work correctly.
explanation_problem3.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

explanation_problem4.message: Information of the page you are viewing is leaked to the outside (URL and Title).
explanation_problem4.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

forcibly_close_restore.message: If Google Chrome has crashed, restore the purged tabs next startup
forcibly_close_restore.description: another option in the options menu

remaiming_memory.message: If remaining RAM is less than this, tabs purges automatically
remaiming_memory.description: another option in the options menu

max_history.message: Days to keep history of purged URLs
max_history.description: another option in the options menu

operateTitle.description: an option title on the option page

operateSyncTitle.description: an option title on the option page

getSettings.description: an option title on the option page

specification.description: A item in information of option page.

spec1.message: Each tab is setting setInterval. If come specified unload time, The extension to judge run unload or not.

spec2.message: If a tab become active, its tab and previous tab are resetting time.

spec3.message: If to unload a tab, the extension load the empty page, and purge memory.

spec4.message: If the current tab contains a exclude list, the icon of extension is changed.

spec5.message: Display the number of tabs that are currently released to the icon of the extension.

spec_icon.message: Are not included in the exclusion list of all.
spec_icon.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_use.message: Matched the exclusion list of specified the users.
spec_icon_use.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_extension.message: Matched the exclusion list which is fixed within the extension.
spec_icon_extension.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_temp.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

feedback.description: A item in information of option page.

feedback_explanation.message: A bug report of this extension, and question, feature suggestions are from here.

infomation_other.description: A item in information of option page.

source_code.description: A item in other of information of option page.

regex.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_compare_string.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_reference.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_option_reference.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_result.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_information.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_single.message: A single character of a, b or c.

regex_any_except.message: Any single character except a, b, or c.

regex_range.message: Any single character in the range a-z.

regex_range_or.message: Any single character in the range a-z or A-Z.
